name: KBISFlashBriefing
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: This flash briefing will provide you with all of the up-to-date news for the KBIS 2019 show. We'll provide you with helpful hints before you arrive, headlines and other news during the event and updates throughout the year.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
